title: I cannot buy the server transfer thing in my account
body:
Hello everyone. I am trying to transfer my very old account that was created when there was just the north american server not the Brazilian one that I am trying to transfer right now. When I finally got some money to transfer it it just inst a purshase option at all. When I go to account in the shop there is just "change summoner name" and nothing like transfer account to europe or Brazil or anything like that. 
I sended 2 tickets already and got nothing not even a confirmation that they have received my ticket. I need help D=

replies.body:
Hey Dexi,

This is due to transfers on NA being disabled currently. I recommend you check out the [Service Status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page for updates as to when this issue will be resolved.

Thanks man. Sucks that everytime I try to transfer it is blocked -_-

Good to know it inst like forever tho.
